descriptionHtml:
This basically is my very first mod. I\'ve always loved Daedric Armor but wasn\'t really a fan of heavy. This is a simple mod for a set of Daedric light armor with no weight, using the same texture as normal Daedric. The armor stats are also much higher and I have also added a two-handed Daedric Greatsword with higher damage.

This set can be found in Whiterun\'s BreezeHome, in the chest of the master bedroom upstairs.
author: Andycg
